title: Please read this!!!
body:
Did they take off the 400 rp off like did they stop giving that and please if you know tell me when cause i made a smurf account and like im not getting the 400 rp or do they just now give it at a higher lvl not lvl 3 anymore cause my account is lvl 5 please somone tell me
:){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
We replaced the 400RP with a new player chest when we rolled out Hextech Crafting.  Can find the announcement about this change [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

You could be correct.  I really don't know since I haven't made a new account in about a year or more.  Try logging out and back in and see if you receive any RP.  I do know that RP and IP sometimes don't refresh properly after addition or subtraction.  For example, I've had a bug where the client showed me as having negative IP, but logging out and back in caused it to refresh and display the correct amount.
